meanings.definition: A small, wingless insect belonging to the order Collembola.
meanings.sent1: The collembolan hopped quickly through the grass.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the behavior of collembolans in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent3: The collembolan threw a tiny party in the anthill.
meanings.sent4: In the miniature world of the garden, the collembolan was a giant explorer.
meanings.sent5: Children love to watch collembolans bounce around like tiny acrobats.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the order Collembola.
meanings.sent1: The collembolan habitat provides a safe environment for these insects.
meanings.sent2: The collembolan community works together to build intricate tunnels.
meanings.sent3: The collembolan dance party was the talk of the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like collembolan diamonds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The collembolan trail led us through a magical forest of tiny wonders.
